Package org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss

Interface Summary
CredentialContext Provides a persistent context for GSS credentials.
CredentialManagerService Describes a service for creating and maintaining credential contexts, where a credential context maintains a handle to a GSS credential for a given user.
CredentialMapping Maps a credential to a resource location
CredentialMappingService  
CredentialMappingSpec  
CredentialMappingTask  
CredentialMappingTest  
CredentialRepository Describes a credential repository.
CredentialRetrievalContext Describes a retrieval context for a GSS credential.
CredentialRetrievalService Describes a service for retrieving credentials.
GssConnection Represents a connection to a gss secured resource.
GssConnectionResource Describes a service resource to which gss secured connections can be made.
GssEnabledResource Describes a service resource to which gss secured connections can be made.
HttpgServiceConnection Describes a connection to an http service resource.
HttpgServiceResource Describes a httpg service resource.
 

Class Summary
CredentialAuthModule Implements the login authentication module interface to support user authentication with the credential retrieval mechanisms provided in this package.
CredentialMappingTaskType  
CredentialRepositoryType Describes a type of credential repository.
CredentialUtil This utility class simplifies the use of the credential package by providing convenient methods for methods commonly used by other portlet services.
GssConnectionResourceType Describes a type of gss service resource.
GssEnabledResourceType Describes a type of gss service resource.
HttpgServiceLocation Describes the location of a web sevice resource.
HttpgServiceResourceType Describes a type of httpg service resource.
 

Exception Summary
CredentialException Describes a credential related exception.
CredentialRetrievalException Describes a credential retrieval related exception.
